it.apice.sapere.demo.rendering.impl
Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Display, Person
public interface Renderable

Basic interface for renderable objects.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 boolean hits(double x, double y)
           Checks if the point is on to the object.
 void moveTo(double x, double y)
           Moves the object in the specified location.
 void render(Graphics2D g)
           Draws the object onto the canvas.
 void setSurface(MainFrame.RenderablePanel surface)
           Let the Renderable know the surface on which it will be displayed.
